api-read-events.name: Read event log
api-read-events.description: Provides a queryable log of events.

api-read-item-state.name: Read item state
api-read-item-state.description: Provide a the status of the item requested.

api-validate-tag.name: Validate tag
api-validate-tag.description: Validate's if the tag is enrolled already.

api-identify-tag.name: Identify tag
api-identify-tag.description: Identify which user the tag is enrolled with.

api-enroll-tag.name: Enroll tag
api-enroll-tag.description: Creates a new tag enrollment and emails the user.

api-member-permission-check.name: Check member's permissions
api-member-permission-check.description: Checks the tag is enrolled to a user with membership and the requested permission.
